title: The Bachelor's Rachael Arahill flaunts her curves in a kaleidoscopic outfit at music festival
text:
She recently confirmed her split from fellow Bachelor beauty Vakoo Kauapirura.

But Rachael Arahill, 23, looked anything but heartbroken as she partied up a storm at Sydney's Listen Out Festival on Saturday.

Sharing a series of snaps on her Instagram, the newly-single reality TV 'villain' bared her midriff in a kaleidoscopic crop top and matching leggings.

Won't lose her in a crowd! Rachael Arahill, 23, looked anything but heartbroken as she partied up a storm at Sydney's Listen Out Festival on Saturday

Rachael accessorised her look with a series of a gold necklaces, hooped chain earrings and a black leather belt bag.

She opted for a face full of dramatic makeup, wearing matte foundation, purple eyeshadow, blush and mauve lipstick.

Adding an eclectic touch to her already eye-catching ensemble, Rachael braided a mix of purple and blue extensions into her blonde locks.

Raunchy look: Sharing a series of snaps on her Instagram, the newly-single reality TV 'villain' bared her midriff in a kaleidoscopic crop top and matching leggings

Throughout the day, the Sydney-based personal trainer documented her wild antics with Instagram snaps showing her dancing in the crowd and showing off her skin-tight ensemble.

On Friday, the blonde bombshell revealed she's hoping to return to reality TV and will be applying for the newly rebooted Big Brother series.

Rachael told fans on Instagram that appearing on Big Brother was a childhood dream of hers.

Eye-catching look: Throughout the day, the Sydney-based personal trainer documented her wild antics with Instagram snaps showing her dancing in the crowd and showing off her skin-tight ensemble

Endemol Shine launched the casting process for Big Brother 2020 on Thursday.

The applications opened just a day after TV Blackbox reported that Channel Seven had purchased rights to the format.

The program, which was filmed at the Dreamworld amusement park on the Gold Coast, premiered in 2001 and lasted for eight seasons on Channel 10.

Following a significant decline in ratings and several high-profile controversies, Channel 10 decided not to renew the series.
description: She recently confirmed that her romance with fellow suitress Vakoo Kauapirura was over.
authors: Ali Daher For Daily Mail Australia
